Reviews.Title: “Close to the airport ? hmmm”
Reviews.Author: Alina1705
Reviews.Content: This is a very nice hotel, i love it, but i bought it only to be close to the airport and guess what ?No bus to the airport ... only taxi . The result ? I paied 20 euros for 2km to the airport. It's better to stay in the centre of Rome and pay 1E or a bit more to get to the airport than this hotel.

Reviews.Title: “To noisy, bad breakfast”
Reviews.Author: sebbll77
Reviews.Content: The hotel itself is nice. But the noise of the Via Appia Nuova is to loud. The breakfast is not the best. For 1 night to be close to the airport ok!

HotelInfo.Name: Locanda delle Corse
HotelInfo.Address: Via Appia Nuova 1260, 00178 Rome, Italy
